channel.title: Pking glitched

item.title: Pking glitched
item.dc:creator: @ownageownt ownageownt
item.description:
@ownageownt wrote:

[quote=“Peter234, post:5, topic:199929”][quote author=skiller noob1 link=topic=264596.msg2187461#msg2187461 date=1208231549]
Your typing is of a 3 year old monkey, please re-type this so I can understand this.
[/quote]

His typing is fine dumbass…and “of a 3 year old monkey” makes no sense.[/quote]

Actually it does make sense.

[Ontopic] You probably set you spec requirements over 100%. Go back and look. [/Ontopic]

Read full topic

item.title: Pking glitched
item.dc:creator: @codeusa codeusa
item.description:
@codeusa wrote:

Yea what he said but still heres my specs

[code]}
public int specBar = 10;
public int specialRestoreTimer;
public boolean specOn = true;
public void SpecialsProcess()
{
esbar(12323);
getRefill();
getFilling();
}
public void esbar(int id)
{
outStream.createFrame(171);
outStream.writeByte(0);
outStream.writeWord(id);
flushOutStream();
}
public void resetBar()
{
specOn = true;
sendQuest(“PWN THEM NOW BEASTA”, 12335);
}

public void getRefill()
{
	if (specialRestoreTimer == 0 && specBar < 10)
	{
		specialRestoreTimer = 120;
		specBar++;
	}
	if(specialRestoreTimer > 0)
		specialRestoreTimer--;
}
public void fsBar(int id1, int id2, int id3)
{
outStream.createFrame(70);
outStream.writeWord(id1);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian(id2);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian(id3);
}

public void getFilling() {
	if (specBar == 10)
	{
		fsBar(500, 0, 12325);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12326);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12327);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12328);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12329);
		fsBar(500, 0, 12330);

	}
	else if (specBar == 9)

		fsBar(500, 0, 12333);
		fsBar(0, 0, 12334);
	}
	else if (specBar == 8)
	{

		fsBar(500, 0, 12327);

	}
	else if (specBar == 7)
	{

		fsBar(0, 0, 12334);
	}
	else if (specBar == 6)
